m.marble-sense: חסר:002002001016:Non-Space:to lack;to be lacking;to fail;to dry up
נעם:002001001028:Good;002001002019:Love:to be lovely;to be pleasant;to be sweet;to be dear
דמה:002004002003:Compare:to be like;to be comparable to;to resemble
אמר:002004001009008:Speak:to say;to speak;to tell;to command;to think;to call
עלה:002002001009:Move:to go up;to climb up;to mount
אחז:002003001010:Hold:to grasp;to take hold of (something);to seize;to catch;to hold on (to something)
תְּשׁוּקָה:002004002001001:Wish:to turn one's attention to;to be enraptured by;to concentrate one's energy on
יצא:002002001009:Move:to go out;to come out;to go away;to leave;to depart
